channel.title: CVE Feed for ManageEngine -- ADAudit Plus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ManageEngine -- ADAudit Plus

item.title: CVE-2024-36037|2024-10-07T19:47:23.406Z -- manageengine -- adaudit%20plus
item.description: Zoho ManageEngine ADAudit Plus versions 7260 and below allows unauthorized local agent machine users to view the session recordings.

item.title: CVE-2024-5490|2024-08-23T14:43:05.433Z -- manageengine -- adaudit%20plus
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine ADAudit Plus versions below 8000 are vulnerable to the authenticated SQL injection in aggregate reports option.

item.title: CVE-2024-36514|2024-08-23T14:44:02.846Z -- manageengine -- adaudit%20plus
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine ADAudit Plus versions below 8000 are vulnerable to the authenticated SQL injection in file summary option.

item.title: CVE-2024-5556|2024-08-23T14:41:47.195Z -- manageengine -- adaudit%20plus
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine ADAudit Plus versions below 8000 are vulnerable to the authenticated SQL injection in reports module.

item.title: CVE-2024-36515|2024-08-23T14:45:08.096Z -- manageengine -- adaudit%20plus
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine ADAudit Plus versions below 8000 are vulnerable to the authenticated SQL injection in dashboard. Note: This vulnerability is different from another vulnerability (CVE-2024-36516), both of which have affected ADAudit Plus' dashboard.

item.title: CVE-2024-5586|2024-08-23T14:40:48.724Z -- manageengine -- adaudit%20plus
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine ADAudit Plus versions below 8121 are vulnerable to the authenticated SQL injection in extranet lockouts report option.

item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine ADAudit Plus versions below 8110 are vulnerable to authenticated SQL Injection in attack surface analyzer's export option.
